com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils

Class NumberConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils.NumberConversion

  • public class NumberConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    This class help to convert bytes array to different formats values types and values types to byte array

    It implements the conversion of values types to array bytes (little endian and big endian)

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    STMicroelectronics - Central Labs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NumberConversion.BigEndian
      This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for Big endian base order
      static class  NumberConversion.LittleEndian
      This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for little endian base order
